title: Dubai Metro fines explained: How to avoid Dh100 to Dh2,000 penalties for rule violations
summary_full: Dubai Metro has enforced strict fines from Dh100 to Dh2,000 for rule breaches. These penalties cover everything from eating and smoking to safety violations. The Roads and Transport Authority aims to ensure passenger safety and a smooth commuting experience. Compliance with rules is crucial for the Metro's reliability and efficiency.
